mdRecord.dcterms:title: Slusher/Jones Cemetery, Court House District
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Laurel Branch Road, just west of the intersection of Laurel Branch and Slusher-Grant Rd. The cemetery sits 300 yards north of Laurel Branch Rd. and can be seen from the road. It is also visible using Google Earth. N36 55.180' W80 22.503'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
